hero.title: Screen Real-time Preview &
hero.description: Pinlens is a professional-grade real-time preview tool built for macOS.
hero.descriptionExtended: Built-in multi-level zoom, rulers, grid system, guides and other professional auxiliary tools to boost productivity.

features.title: Professional Screen Real-time Preview
features.description: Pinlens provides powerful screen real-time preview and zoom measurement capabilities, making it an ideal assistant for UI design, development debugging, and content creation.

areaSelection.name: Area Selection & Real-time Preview
areaSelection.description: Flexibly drag to select any screen area, supports 8-direction resizing and moving, real-time display of selected area content.
areaSelection.cardDescription: Flexibly drag to select any screen area
areaSelection.label: Screen Capture

zoom.name: Zoom & Navigation
zoom.description: Supports 0.5x - 10x zoom, mouse gesture zoom, real-time display of zoom level and viewport position.

designTools.name: Design Auxiliary Tools
designTools.description: Toggleable horizontal/vertical rulers, custom guides, guide position adjustment and deletion.

quickActions.name: Convenient Operations
quickActions.description: Lightweight menu bar application, quick launch with shortcuts, ESC key to quickly close selection overlay.

process.title: Get Started in 3 Simple Steps
process.description: Follow these simple steps to easily start using Pinlens for real-time preview and measurement zoom.

step1.title: Launch App
step1.description: After launching, the app will display an icon in the menu bar, click or press Cmd+Ctrl+P to launch quickly.

step2.title: Select Area
step2.description: Drag to create a selection area, use the control points at corners and edges to adjust size, click to confirm.

step3.title: View Content
step3.description: The app will create a new window to display the real-time content of the selected area, with tools like rulers and grids available.

system.title: Designed for macOS
system.description: Pinlens is designed specifically for macOS Sonoma (15.0+), requires screen recording permission for the best experience.

cta.title: Get Started with Pinlens
cta.description: Experience this screen real-time preview and zoom measurement tool designed for macOS, making UI design, development debugging, and content creation more efficient.
